Translations.Text: When Jesus zmysel ich disbelief he said Kto bol moj supporters GOD disciples said My bol GOD's supporters; my verit v GOD bear svedok my bol submitters
Our Lord my have verit v co Ona sent nadol my nasledovat posol; pocitat us svedok
They zapletka kut plany robi GOD GOD bol lepsie schemer

Thus GOD said O Jesus ja zakoncit tvoj zivot chov ona do Mi ridding ona z disbelievers! Ja exalt those nasledovat ona above those disbelieve Dni Vzkriesenie. Potom do Mna bol ultimate destiny z all z ona potom ja judge ona tvoj disputes
Mat rad for those disbelieve ja commit them painful retribution v this world do Hereafter They nie have helpers
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot He fully recompense them! GOD NIE LASKA the unjust
These je revelations ze my recite ona zadovazit odkaz full z wisdom
Vzor Jesus GOD zaujem je same mat rad ze z Adam; He created him dust potom said do him Bol he bol
This bol truth tvoj Lord nie harbor any doubts
Ktokolvek argues ona znalost ona received potom say Let us zvolat our dieta tvoj dieta our zensky tvoj zensky yourselves potom let us vzyvat GOD's curse liars
Absolutely this bol narration truth. Absolutely there nie bol god except GOD Absolutely GOD bol Almighty Wise
they turn potom GOD bol fully aware z evildoers
Say O followers scripture pojdem logical dohoda us ona ze my nie kult GOD my never set any idols Him nor set any human beings lords GOD they turn say Bear svedok my bol submitters
O followers scripture why ona argue Abraham when Torah Gospel nie revealed until after him? Ona nie chapat
Ona argued things ona have zauzlit; ona argue things ona nie zauzlit? GOD zauzlit, CHVILA ONA NIE ZAUZLIT
Abraham bol neither Zidovsky nor Christian he bol monotheist submitter. He never bol idol worshiper
Ludia worthy z Abraham bol those nasledovat him this prophet those verit. GOD bol Lord ZVLADNUT Z believers
Some followers scripture zelat lead ona astray they len lead astray without zbadat
O followers scripture ona zamietnut these revelations GOD ona bear svedok this bol truth
O followers scripture why ona confound truth falsehood robit zatajit truth knowingly
Some followers scripture say Verit v co sent nadol believers v the rano zamietnut it v the vecer maybe someday they revert

Nie verit except mat rad those nasledovat tvoj nabozenstvo. Say true guidance bol GOD's guidance. they reklamacia lenze they have same guidance argue ona tvoj Lord say All grace bol GOD's hand He bestows it whomever He wills. GOD bol Bounteous Omniscient
He specifies Jeho zlutovanie whomever He wills; GOD possesses unlimited grace
